scripts.build:desktop: cd apps/web && npm run build && cd ../desktop && npm run build
scripts.build:mobile: cd apps/web && npm run build && cd ../mobile && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:desktop && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:server
scripts.build:apk: cd apps/web && npm run build && cd ../mobile && npx cap sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:apk:bundle: cd apps/web && npm run build && cd ../mobile && npx cap sync && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.deploy:github: git push origin main && git push origin --tags
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../desktop && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/types && npm install && cd ../api-client && npm install && cd ../sdk && npm install
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd apps/server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:push: cd apps/server && npx prisma db push
